normalized: She looked up and saw a night sky full of stars.

name: Shisui
normalized: It's much more beautiful than I thought from the books…
Shisui Amamiya, a Taimanin, whispered and smiled at the rare sight she got to see outside the town of Gosha.
Of course, Gosha had its own rich nature and night sky, but it still looked lackluster compared to what she was seeing on this tropical island.

name: Ally Taimanin
normalized: Sh-Shisui-sama!
The voice of her comrade desperately calling her name out got in the way of Shisui's thoughts.

name: Shisui
normalized: …Shut up.
As Shisui shifted her view from the starry night sky to where the voice came from, she saw an intense battle taking place there.
Guouhuoghh!
Coordinates
Area
She was on Taihei Island where the Republic of East Asia Marine Corps had set up a base with runways worth 1150 meters.
A unit of Taimanin assaulted the base and the giant demon that was their target just appeared in front of them.

name: Ally Taimanin
normalized: It really is a monster… So this is what we're up against.
Fire controlled by one of the Taimanin with fire skills engulfed the demon.
However――

name: Demon
normalized: Guoughoughh!
The demon scattered the flame into thin air with its roar and turned the fire Taimanin and two more into mincemeat in a blink of an eye.

name: Shisui
normalized: He's pretty good… Now I'm a little interested.
Shisui had a different purpose than other Taimanin on the mission.
Shisui was the young leader of the Amamiya clan, a servant ninja for the Fuuma clan.
However, she did not serve Danjou Fuuma nor his son, remaining neutral in terms of her loyalty.
Ordinarily, they both would be coming after as a traitor, but her fearsome combat ability prevented them.
She used a rare type of nature-based ninja power, Art of Waves.
She employed wave-type energy that existed naturally and turned them into her powers.
Such power was formidable enough to match that of Murasaki Yatsu.
And she was not just powerful.
She also possessed natural-born combat skills but only the Fuuma clan truly knew that.
That was because she despised the rest of the world, living like a hermit, reading books, and attending the Gosha Academy despite her being a Taimanin.
She had no need to attend the school with her intelligence and knowledge but she still went to Gosha Academy for access to their library.
And Asagi Igawa who was the one of few who knew of her powers outside of the Fuuma clan asked her to join this mission.
And her reward was the right to access some of the forbidden books in the Gosha Academy's library――

name: Ally Taimanin
normalized: Sh-Shisui-sama, w-we cannot…

name: Shisui
normalized: I did not expect you to do much from the beginning… Just stand back for now.
The demon stood in front of still juvenile-looking Shisui.
She could not read the expression from its face but she thought it showed an evil grin.
It was a grin that carried an animalistic desire every woman have seen before.

name: Shisui
normalized: You're a little annoying.
A giant clad in a suit of armor that was the embodiment of wave energy created by Shisui's Wave Escape
Shisui called the giant her guardian.

name: Demon
normalized: Gwuhhoughouhh!
The demon made the move first.
It disappeared for a moment but it got around to Shisui's back the next moment――
And the four mince-making arms attacked Shisui.
However, Shisui's giant easily blocked those arms.

name: Demon
normalized: Guouhghh?!
The demon was supposed to be expressionless but it looked confused.

name: Shisui
normalized: I'm going to kill you quickly if you underestimate me like that.
Shisui swung her right fist and the giant also swung its right fist as if it was mirroring her, hitting the face of the demon.
The demon flew through the air and landed on the hard tarmac of the runway.
Rubble and dust filled the air and other Taimanin cheered as they witnessed Shisui's power, but she calmed them down.

name: Shisui
normalized: That thing redirected my guardian's fists at the last moment.
That thing isn't dead yet.
Right as she said, the concrete rubbled exploded.

name: Demon
normalized: Gwuuhouughh!
The demon jumped around at incredible speed, damaging the runway here and there, creating more dust and rubble.

name: Shisui
normalized: Too slow… You have to be stronger than Asagi-sensei to defeat me.
Shisui easily predicted the demon's attacks and was about to counterattack――

name: Ally Taimanin
normalized: Heeghh?!
The demon suddenly produced a captured Taimanin and used a human shield.
Shisui had to abort her counterattack and that brief moment cost her the victory.

name: Shisui
normalized: You damn monster!
The next moment, the demon's attack struck Shisui.
The guardian blocked the direct hit on Shisui but the shockwave from the demon was enough to knock Shisui's fragile body to slam into the tarmac.

name: Shisui
normalized: Aaaguhh…?!
Shisui's mind faded from the impact.
That caused her guardian to disappear into thin air.
Shisui was dazed as the demon easily picked her up and jumped straight up.
It held Shisui up and down and put it on its shoulder mid-air.
Then it held Shisui's limbs down with its four arms, then took a dive towards the ground――

name: Shisui
normalized: (Guh… I'm gonna be…)
The feeling of falling through the air with gravity put a stern expression on Shisui's face.
She gave up on trying to break out of the hold on her own and braced herself for the impact of the landing.

name: Demon
normalized: Guwwoouhghh!
The demon let out a victorious roar and the voice shook the air from the sheer volume as did Shisui's body.

name: Shisui
normalized: (This is…such a humiliating position… Guh, why… Noo, aaghaahh!
Shisui could not feel the ground approaching and the only thing she could see was the starry sky, only feeling the fall.
She was waiting for the moment of the impact when the demon's feet touched the ground and the shock from the landing came over Shisui's body.

name: Shisui
normalized: Uuuhghaaghhaa aagghh?!
Shisui's eyes opened wide and writhed as she groaned from her gaping mouth, splashing saliva all over the place from the shock of the landing.
And her body trembled from the pain as her groin pointing towards heaven twitched, trying to expel the pain from her body.

name: Demon
normalized: Guwoouhh!
With the joy of scoring a spectacular move, the demon roared and kept holding onto Shisui's body, not letting go.
The demon was created from the cells of Edwin Black.
A monster of augmented human with four arms as twice as big as an average man.
Shisui's mind came back to her but her limbs were completely held down by the monster.
There was no way she could move at all.

name: Shisui
normalized: Let me go!
You monster!
All she could do was scream and verbally resist her but the demon did not understand words.
The demon spread her legs wide and held her down which made her crevice show up through her underwear, screaming pathetically.
And the other Taimanin comrades just watched her, apparently frozen from the shock of what happened.

name: Shisui
normalized: (Nobody's going to help me, it seems… That's fine.
Even if they come, it'll only make a bigger pile of dead bodies… Just stay still.
The most capable fighter there was Shisui and she was captured by the demon, not able to find an opportunity to counterattack.
There was not much run-of-the-mill Taimanin could do under such circumstances.
They could only watch as Shisui was forced to spread her legs wide and maybe assist her only if the opportunity arose.
No one moved on their own.

name: Shisui
normalized: Ughaaghaaghh!
Shisui screamed from the pain as her joints were locked in.
The demon did not need to put much power onto her and the position alone was enough to bring pain to Shisui as her whole body was overcome with pain.

name: Shisui
normalized: Ughyaaghhahh!
Let me go… I said, let me go, aaghaahh!
Just screaming was enough to bring intense pain to her body and it only got worse as she struggled to escape.
Meaning that the only way she could get out was if others attacked the monster from the outside.
Nobody was coming to help Shisui and that was nothing but despair for her as only death awaited her.

name: Shisui
normalized: Guuwwuhghhaaghaahh hhaagghh?!
The demon opened Shisui's legs and tortured her joints as the bones and muscles in her body scream from pain as she expressed agony on her face.
The sound of bones grinding echoed and muscles were pulled as Shisui clenched her teeth and endured but was easily overwhelmed by pain.

name: Shisui
normalized: Mnnghhnmghgaaghaahh hhaagghhahh!

normalized: Guooughh!

name: Shisui
normalized: Guuhhgyaagaahghh hhaahhaaghh!
The pain was so intense that Shisui felt like she was being torn in half at the crack of her butt and could not stop screaming.
The overwhelming pain caused Shisui's thoughts to halter but she barely managed to keep her sanity and thought of a way to escape.

name: Shisui
normalized: (The guarding can…)
Shisui tried to summon her guardian once again to begin her counterattack, however――

name: Demon
normalized: Guuhouohhghh!
The tentacles coming out of the demon's body started capturing the other Taimanin.

name: Shisui
normalized: (This thing… It's not just big.
It knows my thoughts and it's got them…)

name: Ally Taimanin
normalized: Please, just ignore us!
The Taimanin who were nothing but dead weight to Shisui showed their dedication as they were ready to sacrifice themselves.

name: Shisui
normalized: (You… I can't…)
Shisui stopped summing the guardian as she could not bring herself to be that merciless and gave up fighting back.

name: Demon
normalized: Guuoouughh!

name: Shisui
normalized: Gyaaghaaghhaagghh hhaahh!
Then an ominous sound like joints popping out echoed and Shisui screamed with her eyes wide open and her tongue poking out.

name: Shisui
normalized: This hurts, aagahahh!
No more, no more… Stop, eeaaghh!
It was hard to tell from the outside but the bones were dislocated and the demon started putting more force on her.
That caused her joints to pop out and back in again as her bones and cartridges were scraped together, damaging her body from inside.

name: Shisui
normalized: Ughyaaghaahh!
My whole body hurts so much, aaghh!
Please, no more… It's breaking me apart!
She screamed madly from the intense pain and tried to endure the demon's torture as her body froze up.
However, the pain was simply insufferable and the torturous act seemed like it would last forever.

name: Shisui
normalized: Stop this, ooughh!
It's tearing me apart… Guhogouhh!
My legs, they're tearing off, aaghh!

name: Demon
normalized: Guooughh!

name: Shisui
normalized: Mnnghhnmmgheeghghh!
